message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.run: cd mega-linter-runner && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
cd mega-linter-runner && BETAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="beta$BETAID"
cd mega-linter-runner && npm publish --tag beta || echo "mega-linter-runner beta not published"

steps.name: Deploy beta image to DockerHub
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Deploy beta image to GitHub Container Registry
steps.run: .automation/upload-docker.sh

steps.name: Run Test Cases and code coverage
steps.run:
export CI_ENV="$(bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/env)) -e GITHUB_ACTIONS"
echo "CI_ENV=${CI_ENV}"
docker run $CI_ENV -e TEST_CASE_RUN=true -e OUTPUT_FORMAT=text -e OUTPUT_FOLDER=${GITHUB_SHA} -e OUTPUT_DETAILS=detailed -e GITHUB_SHA=${GITHUB_SHA} -e PAT="${{secrets.PAT}}" -e MEGALINTER_VOLUME_ROOT="${GITHUB_WORKSPACE}" -v "/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:rw" -v ${GITHUB_WORKSPACE}:/tmp/lint oxsecurity/megalinter:beta

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET

steps.name: Run Test Cases and code coverage
steps.run:
export CI_ENV="$(bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/env)) -e GITHUB_ACTIONS"
echo "CI_ENV=${CI_ENV}"
docker run $CI_ENV -e TEST_CASE_RUN=true -e OUTPUT_FORMAT=text -e OUTPUT_FOLDER=${{ github.sha }} -e OUTPUT_DETAIL=detailed -e GITHUB_SHA=${{ github.sha }} -e GITHUB_TOKEN="${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}" -e MEGALINTER_VOLUME_ROOT="${GITHUB_WORKSPACE}" -v "/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:rw" -v ${GITHUB_WORKSPACE}:/tmp/lint oxsecurity/megalinter:beta
cd mega-linter-runner && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
cd mega-linter-runner && BETAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="beta$BETAID"
cd mega-linter-runner && npm publish --tag beta || echo "mega-linter-runner beta not published"

steps.name: Get current date
steps.run: echo "BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" >> ${GITHUB_ENV}

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET
cd mega-linter-runner && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
cd mega-linter-runner && BETAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="beta$BETAID"
cd mega-linter-runner && npm publish --tag beta || echo "mega-linter-runner beta not published"

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET
sudo rm -rf /opt/ghc
sudo rm -rf "$AGENT_TOOLSDIRECTORY"

steps.name: Invoke Mirror docker image workflow (Server image)
Invoke Mirror docker image workflow (Main image)

steps.run: cd mega-linter-runner && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
cd mega-linter-runner && BETAID=$(date '+%Y%m%d%H%M') && npm version prerelease --preid="beta$BETAID"
cd mega-linter-runner && npm publish --tag beta || echo "mega-linter-runner beta not published"

sudo rm -rf "$AGENT_TOOLSDIRECTORY"
